description: The lily of the Nile (Agapanthus) is an amazing plant species that is well-known for its large, blue-purple flowers. It is a hardy and drought tolerant perennial, making it the ideal choice for a garden that requires minimal care. The lily of the Nile has lush green foliage and can grow up to three feet in height. Additionally, the fragrant blooms make it a great choice for a showy addition to a garden or patio area. Unique to this species is the fact that it bears no fruit or seed, making it a great option for gardeners looking for a more low-maintenance plant. Its unique beauty, drought resistance, and vibrant blooms make it an amazing choice for any garden.
